title: Bock font
content:
Hello everybody

I am introduce a font inspired on the Egyptian or Serifa type fonts. This have a geometrical process very accurate, i worked some stroke weights like [Muralista](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417183335/http:/typophile.com/node/41657) typeface (also which I am working on another typesetting).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417183335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2459459637_88a611e08e_b-1_5329.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [muestra.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417183335/http:/typophile.com/files/muestra_1.pdf) | 165.92 KB |
author: JRGcisterna

comments.content:

:D  
and good luck for your font..!!!  
good job dude..!!
